short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmarkmanager, add Notes and Screenshots to Bookmarks, Bookmarks in Collections with a nested Folder structure, Easy to use GUI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Organize Bookmarks in Collections, Columns and Tabs. Switch between Tabs and add up to six Columns. 

Add all open Browser Tabs as Bookmarks in one click to a Collection. The nested Folder structure in each Collections helps 
organizing Bookmarks. Add as many Folders as you want to a Collection. Give Collections, Folders and Tabs an expressive Name.
Add Columns to Tabs or delete them if you no longer need them.

Add a Note to each Bookmark. To provide a better Overview, decide if the Url, the Note or the Date of the Bookmark is visible.

Cut and paste folders from one Collection to another with an easy to use GUI. Cut a Folder and paste it as a new Collection in
a Column or Tab of Your choice. 

TabflowNotes provides a Screenshot Window to view Screenshots inside the Extension. Place it anywhere and resize it to your needs.
You can take two kind of Screenshots. An Html or an Image Screenshot. An Html Screenshot is like the Website itself without Scripts.
An Image Screenshot is like a Photo of a complete Website. Add Textfields to Screenshots and scroll to each Text Field with 
one click.

All Collections, Columns and Tabs can be stored as a Bookmarkset in the Cloud or on a local Storage Device like your Harddrive or
USB-Stick. This makes it easy to share Bookmarksets across different Browsers.

It's possible to create up to 30 Bookmarksets inside one Browser. Switch between Bookmarksets in the Sidebar of Tabflownotes. 

A Popup Window makes it easy to add Bookmarks to the active Bookmarkset. Just follow the Tooltip to see where you can add Bookmarks.
